sense.def:
If
uporabljamo v pogojnih stavkih, kadar omenimo dogodek ali okoliščine, ki bi se lahko zgodile, ki se morda dogajajo ali so se morda zgodile.

seg.quote: If all goes well, Voyager 2 will head on to Uranus.
If any questions occur to you, then don't hesitate to write.
If I could afford it I would buy a boat.

sense.def:
If
uporabljamo tudi v odvisnih vprašalnih stavkih.

seg.quote: I asked her if I could help her.
I wonder if you'd give the children a bath?

sense.def:
If not
uporabljamo, na primer, kadar želimo namigniti, da je neka količina morda večja ali ura zgodnejša od tiste, ki smo jo prej omenili.

seg.quote: They have hundreds of thousands if not millions of pounds of investment.
I'd like to see you tonight, if not sooner.

sense.def:
If I were you
lahko rečemo, kadar nekomu damo nasvet.

seg.quote: If I were you I'd take the money.

sense.def:
Izraz
if anything
uporabimo, kadar povemo nekaj, kar potrdi pravkar izrečeno negativno trditev.

seg.quote: It certainly wasn't an improvement. We were, if anything, worse off than before.

sense.def:
Izraz
if only
uporabimo, kadar omenimo razlog, zakaj smo nekaj storili.

seg.quote: I'll have a glass myself, if only to stop you from drinking it all.

sense.def:
Z besedama
if only
tudi uvedemo željo, zlasti tako, ki je ni mogoče izpolniti.

seg.quote: If only she could have lived a little longer.

sense.def:
Izraz
as if
uporabimo, kadar opisujemo, kako je nekaj storjeno v primerjavi z nečim drugim.

seg.quote: She folded her arms as if she were cold.
